                        EMBA Information Session 
                           November 28, 2017, 6 p.m. – 8 p.m.
 Attend our next John Molson Executive MBA information session to get an insight into the overall learning experience. Meet graduates from the program and learn about all aspects of the  John Molson EMBA  and how it is designed to take your professional career to the next level. 
 Register now ! 
  Where    
Room 10.302,  
     John Molson Building  (1450 Guy), Sir George Williams Campus 
 Cost 
 This event is free 
 Speakers 
 Marie Lyster

 Marie Lyster
